# Love2D-diep.io üöÄ

A recreation of the popular web game *diep.io*, built using the **L√ñVE (Love2D)** framework and Lua. 

This project focuses on recreating *diep.io* as close as possible.

---

## üõ† Features (Current Progress: ~30%)
- [x] Basic tank movement and rotation.
- [x] Projectile physics and firing mechanics.
- [x] Modular entity system (Players, Bullets, Shapes).
- [x] Shape spawning and collision detection.
- [x] Leveling and upgrade system.
- [x] Tank classes/evolutions.
- [ ] *diep.io* Gamemodes.
- [ ] Iconic *diep.io* Bosses.
- [ ] Custom Bots.

## üöÄ Getting Started

### How to Run

### Method one (recommended)

1. Download the zip from the latest release
   
2. Extract the zip
   
3. In the new folder double click the *Game.exe* file.

4. Enjoy üëç

### Method two (technical)

### Prerequisites
You will need the **L√ñVE** framework installed on your machine:
* [Download Love2D here](https://love2d.org/) (Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux).

1. Clone the repository:
   ```bash
   git clone [https://github.com/Maw-YT/Love2D-diep.io.git](https://github.com/Maw-YT/Love2D-diep.io.git)
2. Navigate to the directory:
   ```bash
   cd Love2D-diep.io
3. Run the game
   ```bash
   love .

### üéÆ Controls
* WASD: Move your tank.
* Mouse: Aim.
* Hold Left Click: Fire.
